content: Yaksha King is one of the Yaoguai Kings you'll need to fight at the end of Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. He's the final boss of the Chapter, so expect a challenging fight.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yaksha_King.md', within the main section titled 'Yaksha King'.
The content is as follows:
Yaksha King is one of the Yaoguai Kings you'll need to fight at the end of Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. He's the final boss of the Chapter, so expect a challenging fight.
